/* Language: CSP Description: Content Security Policy definition highlighting Author: Taras Website: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP vim: ts=2 sw=2 st=2 */ /** @type LanguageFn */ function csp(hljs) { const KEYWORDS = [ "base-uri", "child-src", "connect-src", "default-src", "font-src", "form-action", "frame-ancestors", "frame-src", "img-src", "manifest-src", "media-src", "object-src", "plugin-types", "report-uri", "sandbox", "script-src", "style-src", "trusted-types", "unsafe-hashes", "worker-src" ]; return { name: 'CSP', case_insensitive: false, keywords: { $pattern: '[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*', keyword: KEYWORDS }, contains: [ { className: 'string', begin: "'", end: "'" }, { className: 'attribute', begin: '^Content', end: ':', excludeEnd: true } ] }; } module.exports = csp;
